name: Homebound (itch) (Fontys Game Design & Technology)
description:
Play as a snail whose shell has been stolen by a magpie. Use your whip to manoeuvre over and under obstacles, and defeat those who stand in your way to the nest. In this prototype, you can walk around a bit and defeat some enemies.  

For this game you need to use a controller/gamepad. Keyboard controls are not supported.

||CONTROLS||

Move- Left control stick

Jump- Southern face button (A on Xbox) or Right Shoulder.

Aim whip- Right control stick

Release Whip- Release Right control stick.

Please leave feedback if you encounter issues. Thanks for playing.

Some bugs we are already aware of are:

-Some ceilings can't be crawled on correctly.

-Camera trigger on right side of room acts up.

-When player touches ceiling and wall, stamina decreases twice as fast.

-Moonwalk.

-No respawn yet.
